name: Lord of Power Golden Eagle
description: Lord of power is a GameFi with NFT equipment as the core. It presents decentralized finance through the game. Its mode combines game and finance. Players can optimize and upgrade the game according to the characteristics of the game. The game has a collection of mining, territory construction, card collection, equipment building, resource collection, combat and other playing methods. Users can use GDE tokens in this game. In the later stage of the game, large-scale combat modes such as territory war and kingdom war will be opened. Users' assets can not only be used as equipment or tools in the game, but also can be rewarded and rewarded in the process of playing the game.
